description: The family will love these succulent pork steaks served with a creamy mushroom sauce. This easy dinner recipe is a breeze to whip up in just three simple steps.
keywords: Pork Steaks with Creamy Mushroom & Pepper Sauce
name: Pork Steaks with Creamy Mushroom & Pepper Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
200 g punnet sliced Swiss brown mushrooms

recipeInstructions.text: Add pork and resting juices to pan. Simmer, turning pork, for 2 minutes or until heated through. Divide mashed potato among plates. Top with pork and sauce. Scatter over remaining parsley, season with pepper and serve with beans.
